name: Gunfire Factory
description:
Gunfire Factory was built as a prototype gymnasium based around the concept of stacking mods on a gun. The team worked on building multiple mechanics on top of the FPS Unreal template with the idea that multiple gun mod mechanics can be used together on the same gun. The player can mix and match mods to create a weapon of their liking. 

The mods themselves are divides into 2 categories : physical and elemental. A gun is allowed to have as many physical mods as the player wants and a single elemental mod. 

Tech doc : https://docs.google.com/document/d/1LweVNgQoGS7PEmxzGBiLOASDPnNR0YXn/edit?usp=sh...

Team Members : 

Amos Dong, Hyrum Gunther, KD Singh, Shankar Siddharth Kanniappan Anbalagan, Yexiang Zhou
